name: Tile Remove
description:
Your goal is to remove all the tiles from the board.
Tap on clusters of identically-colored tiles to select them. Tap again to remove the tiles.
The bigger the cluster, the higher your score.
Use bombs to blow up single tiles.
Use flippers to make 2 single tiles of different colors switch places.
Win bombs and flippers to easily clear the stage.
Earn up to 3 stars per stage.

FEATURES:
* 72 stages
* 6 difficulty levels
* bombs to blow up any leftovers
* flippers to make tiles switch places
* special color for double points
* unlimited undos
